table.name: vtiger_processflow
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_processflow` ( `processflowid` int(11) default NULL, `processflowname` varchar(255) default NULL, `procflowid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `description` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `starttasksubstatus` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `processflowcase` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tasksla` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `endtasksubst` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cuestinario` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `processflowsecurity` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `linktoprocesstemplate` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `end_subst` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `livello` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `cuestionarioid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `stato` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `defaultvl` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `attivo` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `starttaskname` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `endtaskname` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `todoaction` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `sequencer` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `alertsettingmodel` varchar(5) DEFAULT '', `mailer_action` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `manual` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `movestocksequencer` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `flussoparalello` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`processflowid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_processflowcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_processflowcf` ( `processflowid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`processflowid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
